name: Recipe: Qingce Stir Fry
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Qingce Stir Fry.

value.name: Mushroom
value.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

value.name: Lotus Head
value.desc: An aquatic plant native to Liyue that grows and blooms in pairs. One is fragrant, and the other bitter. It's said to make a good herbal medicine.

value.name: Jueyun Chili
value.desc: A spicy plant native to Liyue. Merely smelling it makes one hot and thirsty.

value.name: Cabbage
value.desc: A layered, leafy vegetable. Said to have originally been an ornamental plant, it certainly looks great in the pot.

value.name: Qingce Stir Fry
value.desc: A dish cooked over a roaring fire. They say it was originally just a rustic dish that everyone in Qingce Village knew how to make. But quite unexpectedly, its crispy and spicy dishes gained the recognition of people from elsewhere, and thus began to spread throughout the Liyue region.

value.text: <color=#ffffffd9>Purchase from Ms. Bai in Qingce Village</color>
